formattedAddress: 139 Centre St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 139 Centre St, New York, NY 10013-4552, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Thai Luong and his staff rocks!!!! Been going here for almost 2 decades and I refer everyone that needs a dentist that is near him! My worst fear....him retiring.  My husband and I absolutely love them! They are honest. They don't try to sell you things or do procedures just to get the $$$. That is why we love him!

text.text: Dr. Thai Luong and his staff rocks!!!! Been going here for almost 2 decades and I refer everyone that needs a dentist that is near him! My worst fear....him retiring.  My husband and I absolutely love them! They are honest. They don't try to sell you things or do procedures just to get the $$$. That is why we love him!

originalText.text: The best dentist in NYC!  The staff are so friendly and Dr. Thai Luong is the best! Our family of 5 have been going to this practice for 20 years!  Highly recommend.

text.text: The best dentist in NYC!  The staff are so friendly and Dr. Thai Luong is the best! Our family of 5 have been going to this practice for 20 years!  Highly recommend.

originalText.text:
I have been going for years but recently I had a talk with that dentist and she said one of my root canals on the x-ray was " dark" and was hard to see on the x-ray ( she said a possible need to remove that tooth). Recommending me to an oral surgeon to get another x-ray and see what their report was, instead I went to go to a different dentist saying that nothing was wrong with my teeth. Now i'm not sure about going back here

She also mentioned about possibly needing my wisdom tooth out because they are " poking out" but the other dentist says that I don't need to pull them out until it irritates me , looking at the x-ray myself I only have one wisdom teeth as a problem and not all 3( yes, I only have 3 of them)  this also makes me think back that the dentist at this place never shows my x-ray and explain things to me, so now I see this place as unreliable. sorry.
